thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 3 of 693
thread.title: GLENN
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by GLENN

author: GLENN
title: GLENN
text: I booked over the phone because I had trouble on your website but when I spoke to a lady, even though she was busy, she was more than happy to organise my car within minutes, the lady at the counter was a different story when I picked the car up but when I dropped it off I felt comfortable and happy with the car and your company and I would recommend your company to friends and I would use you guys again, thanks Glenn
